events.name: La Poste Day
events.description: La Poste will be on hand at the MDE all day to offer you a snack and goodies, as well as to present its best job offers!

events.name: AFTERWORK BDI
events.description: It's BDI's turn to present itself! During this afterwork, you'll be able to find out about the various activities of the BDI while eating delicious snacks.
